description.name: Hi, I'm Maicon Friedel!
description.part1: I've been working as a fullstack developer since 2018, with solid experience in C# and .NET, as well as front-end development with React.
description.part2: Throughout my career, I've contributed to the development of system integrations, leveraging REST APIs, C#/.NET, and Microsoft SQL Server, always aiming to deliver efficient and scalable solutions.
description.part3: I'm passionate about exploring new technologies and have been deepening my knowledge in Node.js with TypeScript, expanding my development stack.
description.part4: Since July 2025, I've taken on the challenge of working as a Tech Lead, leading a development team. This role has been an incredible opportunity for professional growth, strengthening my skills in leadership, collaboration, and strategic thinking.
description.part5: ➡️ In this portfolio, you can explore my technical skills and the projects I've worked on.
